title: 300+ Patients Treated in One Day
description: Our medical camp in Dhaka successfully treated over 300 patients with free consultations and medicines.

title: Emergency Response at Flood Zone
description: Specialists rushed to flood-affected areas providing emergency health services to over 100 individuals.

title: Children Vaccination Camp
description: Over 200 children were safely vaccinated in our healthcare awareness and vaccination program.

title: Free Diabetes Checkup and Consultation
description: In Rajshahi, 150+ people received free blood sugar tests and dietary consultation.
